title: Simple Ways to Get Dragon Talon in Blox Fruits

steps.title: Make sure you have at least 400 mastery in Dragon Breath, $3,000,000, and 5,000 fragments.
steps.content: Make sure you have at least 400 mastery in Dragon Breath, $3,000,000, and 5,000 fragments. You only need to defeat enemies using moves in Dragon Breath or the click attack to get enough mastery. If your fighting style is weak now and you have a higher damaging weapon on you, use the high damaging weapon to get the enemies low and finish them with Dragon Breath. It is recommended to grind high mastery dropping enemies(such as Bosses). [1] X Research source Have at least $3,000,000 and 5,000 fragments on you to finalize the transaction. If you don't have all of this immediately, you just give Uzoth the Fire Essence and don't learn Dragon Talon. Return when you have $3,000,000 and 5,000 fragments and you can learn the fighting style.

steps.title: Buy a Random Surprise from the Death King until you get a Fire Essence.
steps.content: Buy a Random Surprise from the Death King until you get a Fire Essence. Find the Death King in the Haunted Castle located in the Third Sea. He is located at the left part of Haunted Castle, just in the cube shaped structure in front of the graveyard. You can buy a Random Surprise 10 times every 2 hours for 50 bones each roll(500 bones every 2 hours). [2] X Research source You might have to do this multiple times over the course of a few days or get the Fire Essence randomly within your first 10 purchases.

steps.title: Give Uzoth the Fire Essence.
steps.content: Give Uzoth the Fire Essence. He's located outside of the Dragon Dojo on Hydra Island. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Talon Lighter/Z.
steps.content: Talon Lighter/ Z . 125 mastery. You light your hand on fire and dash toward the cursor. If an enemy is in the way, you grab them and the fire turns blue. After about 2 seconds, you knock back the enemy. Hold down Z to increase the length of the dash.

steps.title: Ember Annihilation/X.
steps.content: Ember Annihilation/ X . 250 mastery. This lets you fire a projectile towards your cursor that will drag any enemies away and damage them. Once the projectile reaches a wall or maximum distance, it will explode for high damage. As well as the main attack that drags enemies away and damages them, Ember Annihilation also leaves a trail of damaging flames on the ground. Move your cursor after pressing X to maneuver Ember Annililation.

steps.title: Infernal Vortex/C.
steps.content: Infernal Vortex/ C . 350 mastery. Once C is pressed, you charge up 6 flames that swirl around your character. When the flames reach the center or where your character is, they explode, knocking back anything around you and dealing heavy damage. Other players' screens will temporarily turn orange during this blast. [4] X Research source
